title: Aron Kodesh Restoration Unveiled
body: Yeshiva Ateres Yisroel has restored its centuries-old Aron Kodesh, crafted in Italy over 200 years ago, to its former glory. The 250-year-old Aron Kodesh was built in Galicia by Jewish artisan Cohen.

title: Yerushalayim Yarchei Kallah Registration
body: Agudas Yisroel of America opens registration for Yerushalayim Yarchei Kallah 5786/2026, set for President’s Week in Yerushalayim Ir HaKodesh, from February 15-19, 2026.
